snippet: Older, less educated and lower-income consumers who may lack fast Internet connections at home may benefit from paper statements, a new report says.
abstract: Ann Carrns Your Money Adviser column offers questions and answers about paper and electronic financial statements.
lead_paragraph: Older, less educated and lower-income consumers who may lack fast Internet connections at home may benefit from paper statements, a new report says.

headline.print_headline: Paper Bank Statements May Be Better Than Digital for Some
headline.main: Paper Bank Statements May Surpass Digital for Some Customers
